Network Technology

5G

Network Technology

LTE

LTE (Long-Term Evolution) is an enhanced 4G network technology that delivers significantly faster download and upload...

Data Features

Hotspot / Mobile Hotspot

A mobile hotspot is a cellular feature that allows you to share your phone's internet connection with other devices like...

Network Management

Deprioritization

Data deprioritization is the temporary slowing of your mobile data speeds during times of high network congestion....

Device & SIM

BYOD (Bring Your Own Device)

BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) means using your existing, unlocked smartphone with a new carrier instead of buying a new...

Switching Carriers

Number Porting

Number porting is the process of transferring your existing phone number from one carrier to another when switching...

Calling Features

WiFi Calling

WiFi calling is a mobile phone feature that allows you to make and receive voice calls over an internet connection...

Calling Features

VoLTE

VoLTE (Voice over LTE) is technology that transmits voice calls over 4G LTE networks instead of older 2G or 3G...

Device & SIM

SIM Card / eSIM

A SIM card (Subscriber Identity Module) is a small chip that stores your phone number and carrier information,...

Device & SIM

Unlocked Phone

An unlocked phone is a mobile device that can work with any compatible wireless carrier, not just one specific carrier....
